features: VAIROUS SIZE & MULTIFUNCTION: There are 4 sizes for selection 17"x12" 24"x14" 34"x17" 36"x20" . It can be used as a mouse and keyboard pad writing desk pad or desk blotter pad, there is no need to buy an extra mouse pad, which can save your money. It can act as a soft resting surface for your hands while writing, or using the mouse

WASHABLE & HIGH QUALITY: Washable surface are easier to clean than others. Use a wet cloth or wipe to clean, it will soon be dry. Made by high quality leather, which prevents it from fraying, indenting, scratching and ensures longer lifespan

NON-SLIP BASE & ULTRA-SMOOTH SURFACE: Featuring a slip-proof velvet base, it remains still when in use. Non-glare surface with litchi pattern reduces eye strain and gives the writer a premier writing experience.

A BETTER PLACE TO ENTERTAIN/WORK/STUDYING: Its smooth surface allows you to play computer games smoothly, do your work comfortably or writing smoothly even if your desk is cranny or flawed, creating a better environment

SNACK MAT & COASTER: Act as a snack mat or a coaster, most of girls like to enjoy snack in their lovely beds and they can put snack on it while keep their beds clean. Also be used as a coaster as it is waterproof. When you spill water on it, just wipe it
description: Teather desk pad is a great addition to workplace surface. The high quality material is made to look like real leather with the added benefit of being water resistant. Its thin design, 3mm thickness, provides a malleable, flat desk mat for a superior writing surface.  Design Add modern class and style without compromising protection for your workspace. The carefully constructed desk blotter features a slightly textured surface giving it a leather appearance but flat enough to use as a writing pad for your documents. You can write on documents without puncturing through paper or worrying about indenting the desk blotter.  Protection The faux leather looks like real leather with a nano bottom to prevent slipping. The rectangular desk blotter protects your surfaces from scratches, stains, and spills. The high quality materials will not damage desktops, tabletops, or the objects placed on top of the mat.  Easy Cleaning Keep your luxurious desk mat beautiful by occasionally cleaning it. Use mild soap or detergent, mix in warm water, and use a clean cloth dipped in the solution to wipe it down. Faux leather cleaners and conditioners can also be used.  12 Month Warranty At Teather , we back our products all with 12-month warranty and provide friendly, easy-to-reach support.  Specifications:  S: 17"x12" M:24"x14"  L:34"x17"  XL:36"x20"
